title: Create a GIF from OptimalBlue Widget
job_description:
Develop a system that automatically captures and updates a screenshot of the mortgage rate widget from Optimal Blue and makes it available for:

Email embedding – A hosted, non-clickable image that updates daily.
SMS/MMS sharing – A direct link to the latest image, sent via text.

Requirements
Automated Screenshot Capture
Source URL: https://www2.optimalblue.com/OBMMI/widget.php
Capture a full-page screenshot of the widget.
Crop/resize if needed to fit within 750px width for email compatibility.
Save image as latest-mortgage-rates.jpg.

Hosting & Image Delivery
Store the image on a publicly accessible server (e.g., AWS S3, Cloudflare, Firebase, or a simple web server).
Ensure the image overwrites the previous version (same URL, so email/SMS links remain valid).
Generate a publicly accessible URL (e.g., https://yourdomain.com/latest-mortgage-rates.jpg).

Email Integration (Non-Clickable Image)
Provide an img tag for embedding in email:

img src="https://yourdomain.com/latest-mortgage-rates.jpg" alt="Today's Mortgage Rates" width="750"
Ensure the image auto-updates daily.

SMS/MMS Integration
Allow the latest image to be shared via SMS/MMS.
Use Twilio API (or an alternative SMS provider) to send MMS messages.

5. Automation & Scheduling
Automate the screenshot capture and image upload once per day (cron job or cloud function).
Automate daily SMS/MMS sending to a predefined list of contacts (if applicable). less
